meanings.sent1: The cake had a butterier taste than the cookies.
meanings.sent2: Her toast was butterier than usual this morning.
meanings.sent3: The butterier popcorn made the movie even better.
meanings.sent4: The butterier clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The butterier sauce coated the pasta like a golden blanket.

meanings.definition: Having a smooth or creamy texture like butter.
meanings.sent1: The butterier mashed potatoes melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The butterier lotion left her skin feeling soft and smooth.
meanings.sent3: The butterier ice cream was a cool treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as butterier as silk when she sang.
meanings.sent5: The butterier frosting on the cake was irresistible to everyone.
